Package org.nosco

Interface Summary
Query<T extends Table> The Query interface is the center of the Nosco API.
 

Class Summary
Condition This class represents a SQL conditional statement.
Constants Defines constants for use in this API.
Field<T> This class represents a column in a table.
Field.FK Represents a foreign key constraint.
Field.PK Represents a primary key constraint.
MirroredDataSource This class wraps other javax.sql.DataSource instances.
QueryFactory  
ReflectedDataSource This class will, given a class name and a method, call that method to get an actual javax.sql.DataSource.
Table This is the base class of all classes generated by this API.
Table.TableAlias  
TransactionThread This class contains is used to start, commit and roll back transactions when using this API.
 

Enum Summary
Constants.DB_TYPE  
Constants.DIRECTION
